Name: Crusader A1 Spirit
Description:
Manufacturer: Crusader Industries
Focus: Light Bomber

Crusader Industries brings its usual commitment to excellence directly to the civilian market with the A1 Spirit, a mid-size multi-purpose starship equipped as a light bomber but packing enough versatility to tackle multiple roles and unpredictable jobs.
